titles.title: A bill to revise the duties of the Office of Refugee resettlement with respect to unaccompanied alien children, and for other purposes.
A bill to revise the duties of the Office of Refugee resettlement with respect to unaccompanied alien children, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
